text: Décio Cattaruzzi is a retired volleyball player from Brazil. Décio competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born on 13 November 1948.Décio Cattaruzzi == References == Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian volleyball players Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:People from Santo André Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo (state)
title: Décio Cattaruzzi
